Verses: 1 annaalil Ezhu Sthreegal Ore Purushanaip Pidiththu Naangal Engal Sondha Aagaaraththaip Pusiththu, Engal Sondha Vasthiraththai Uduppom; Engal Nindhai Neengumpadikku Unpermaaththiram Engalmel Vilangattum Enbaargal.
2 isravelil Thappinavargalukku Annaalile Karththarin Kilai Alangaaramum Magimaiyumaayirukkum; Boomiyin Kani Avargalukku Sirappum Alangaaramumaayirukkum.
3 appozhudhu, Aandavar, Seeyon Kumaaraththigalin Azhukkaik Kazhuvi, Nyaayaththin Aaviyinaalum, Sutterippin Aaviyinaalum, Erusalemin Raththappazhigalai Adhin Naduvilirundhu Neekkividumpodhu,
4 seeyonil Meedhiyaayirundhu, Erusalemil Thariththirundhu Jeevanukkendru Perezhudhappattavanevanum Parisuththanendru Sollappaduvaan.

5 appozhudhu Karththar Seeyon Malaiyilulla Ellaa Vaasasthalangalilum Adhin Sabaigalinmelum, Pagalil Megaththaiyum Pugaiyaiyum, Iravil Kozhundhuvittu Eriyum Akkinippragaasaththaiyum Undaakkuvaar; Magimaiyaanavaigalinmelellaam Kaaval Undaayirukkum.
6 pagalile Veyilukku Nizhalaagavum, Perungaatrukkum Mazhaikkum Adaikkalamaagavum, Maraividamaagavum, Oru Koodaaram Undaayirukkum.
